Uses of Interface
org.hibernate.query.restriction.Restriction

Packages that use Restriction
Package
Description
org.hibernate.query.restriction
The Restriction framework.
org.hibernate.query.specification
Support for SelectionSpecification and MutationSpecification which is similar in concept to criteria queries, but focused on ease-of-use and less verbosity.
org.hibernate.query.specification.internal
 
org.hibernate.query.sqm.internal
Package for the SQM-backed Query implementation details
